nodes.text: Skokare was a member of the Purge Troopers, a group of elite stormtroopers who enforced the Galactic Empire's rule in the Anoat sector on behalf of Governor Ubrik Adelhard, serving as an agent. At some point during the Empire's Iron Blockade of the sector, Skokare and a team of Purge Troopers were sent to the floating colony of Cloud City with the order of terminating Huliasu, a young Nothoiin suspected of doing contraband. However, Skokare and their men were defeated and killed by the Smuggler before they could carry out their order.
